high_signal_items.title: A unified theory of order flow, market impact, and volatility
high_signal_items.why_it_matters: This paper introduces a microstructural model that reconciles empirical properties of order flow, trading volume, and volatility, providing a unified framework that could enhance understanding and prediction of market dynamics.

high_signal_items.title: Diverse Approaches to Optimal Execution Schedule Generation
high_signal_items.why_it_matters: The application of MAP-Elites for trade execution offers a novel approach to generating diverse strategies that adapt to different market conditions, potentially improving execution performance.

high_signal_items.title: Trade uncertainty impact on stock-bond correlations: Insights from conditional correlation models
high_signal_items.why_it_matters: Understanding the impact of trade policy uncertainty on stock-bond correlations can inform investment strategies, particularly in volatile political environments.

new_agent_ideas.edge_hypothesis: Utilizing the unified theory of order flow to predict volatility and market impact based on core order flow persistence.
new_agent_ideas.test_plan: Backtest using historical order flow data to validate predictions against actual market volatility and impact.

new_agent_ideas.edge_hypothesis: Employing MAP-Elites to develop execution strategies that adapt to liquidity and volatility regimes, improving execution efficiency.
new_agent_ideas.test_plan: Simulate execution strategies in a controlled environment and compare performance against traditional execution methods.

new_agent_ideas.edge_hypothesis: Exploiting shifts in stock-bond correlations driven by trade policy uncertainty to identify arbitrage opportunities.
new_agent_ideas.test_plan: Analyze historical periods of trade policy uncertainty to identify correlation shifts and backtest arbitrage strategies.

new_data_sources.name: Trade Policy Uncertainty Index
new_data_sources.use_case: Used to assess the impact of trade policy uncertainty on market correlations and inform macroeconomic strategies.

new_data_sources.name: High-Frequency Order Flow Data
new_data_sources.use_case: Essential for analyzing market microstructure and developing predictive models for volatility and market impact.
